item.description:
Training and Trivia is back this week after a one week hiatus.

Please join us this week at Joe Sent Me in Cambridge for a run at 6:30pm, then trivia afterwards at 8:00pm. We usually start the run on the bike path and go up to Arlington Center and then head back, about 4.5 miles round trip. Then at 8:00 we'll stay for dinner and play Stump Trivia and compete for cash prizes and bragging rights. Feel free to join for either the run or the trivia if you can't do both. For those trivia buffs out there, we could always use people knowledgeable in the pop culture, business, sports, music, literature, science, and politics.

Hope to see you there this Tuesday!

Cheers!

Bill
item.how_to_find_us: Look for people in running gear just outside the bar

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Training and Trivia
